programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3351
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45184519
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep853854
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1768
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M) Ep373
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company which all staffs are women. Unfortunately, he is clueless with women so he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love Mona.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her father’s restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: God of War
programme.desc: During the 16th century, pirates rule the Chinese coastline, pillaging the small villages and terrorizing the citizens. When maverick leader Commander Yu (martial arts legend Sammo Hung) enlists the help of a sharp young general (Vincent Zhao), they devise a plan to defeat the pirates.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: Famed doctor Mo Tian Shi (Richard Ng) concocts an immortality medicine to save his terminally ill daughter Xiao Xin, but the cost for immortality is that she must drink human blood. Twenty years later, Mo's apprentice Li Yao Shi (Chin Siu Ho) returns to town and notices something is amiss, only to realise the horror is just about to begin…

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Peace Breaker
programme.desc: Police officer Gao accidentally kills a pedestrian on the way to his mother's funeral. He tries to dispose the body by hiding it in his mother's coffin. As the pedestrian turns out to be a wanted person and a police officer witnessed the accident, Gao is forced to bring his body back to the police station. Can the case be settled so easily?

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kong’s greatest filmmakers. It traces Hui’s life story and her 40-year career’s ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li’s new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the ‘Flying Guillotine Squad’, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc:
Wang Hsiao Feng plays a girl from a rich family who marries a sympathetic, equally heartbroken passer-by on impulse. One thing after another occurs until the couple achieves an unexpected, yet completely satisfying and happy ending.
The 5th Hong Kong Film Awards: Best Actress (Wang Hsiao Feng) / Best Screenplay (Jamie Luk & Charles Tang)

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: That Man In Chang-An
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife, and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou’s brother Xiao Lou knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge on Fung and his sister-in-law.

programme.title: The Cave Of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother’s Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord’s home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists’ cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Portrait In Crystal
programme.desc: Tragic deaths in the underworld cause leader "Yama" (Teng Wei-hao) to suspect a portrait in crystal with mysterious powers. He sends Hen Pan (Chen Hung) and Pai Pan (Hung Hsin-nan) to interrogate its creator, martial artist Lung Fei (Pai Piao)...

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in the northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Because of his ignorance and silly behaviour, he was seen as a joke to the people. The warlord was finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: This little-seen sixties espionage thriller from Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu boasts a star-studded cast including legendary martial artist Cheng Pei Pei and Paul Chang.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their daughter Ling Yun, the eldest son Ling Hsiao, and a young artist Hsu, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogirai
programme.desc: Vikram, a young man, plans to make his fiancee fall in love with him. However, when his plan backfires, he finds himself embroiled in a love triangle.

programme.title: Junga
programme.desc: Junga is involved in a fight, because of which his family loses the theatre that they own. In order to get it back, he devises a plan that takes him to Paris, where he fights a criminal gang.

programme.title: Mersal
programme.desc: Maaran, a doctor, is falsely arrested for the murder of his colleague, Dr Arjun Zachariah. He soon discovers that the real culprit is a lookalike who aims to expose corruption in the medical industry.

programme.title: Bow Bow
programme.desc: Sanju, a little boy, adopts different methods to train his lazy dog. His world, however, comes crashing down when he loses the dog.

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Arivarasu goes to Canada to search for his missing brother-in-law. However, he discovers a plot by terrorists to kill all intellectuals in India and stop the country's growth.

programme.title: Maragatha Naanayam
programme.desc: A young man races to find a legendary treasure which causes him many troubles.

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Bhaskar, a single parent, is labelled rascal because of his impolite behaviour. His son, Akash, decides to set him up with Anu, whose daughter is Akash's classmate.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Ignoring her misgivings, a young woman purchases a vintage car, which seems to have a mind of its own. Further investigation reveals that it is possessed by a vengeful spirit with ties to her past.

programme.title: Housefull
programme.desc: When a bomb is placed inside a theatre during a show, the owner has to decide if he should go against the cops and empty the theatre. Instead, the cops want to defuse it without informing the viewers.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Kurup
programme.desc: Kurup is a criminal who is on the run from police after murdering someone for life insurance fraud.

programme.title: Chithirai Sevvanam
programme.desc: After Aishwarya, a teenager, goes missing after her sensual video gets leaked on social media, her father Muthupandi takes the help of the local police to find her. Will Muthupandi succeed?

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: The film was a box-office success and was dubbed in a couple of languages.The story revolves around Akhilan, an ex-RAW agent who is assigned the task to track down the culprit who is responsible for the attack on Indian Embassy in Malaysia.

programme.title: Kuttram 23 (2.5 Hrs)
programme.desc: ACP Vetrimaaran unravels a crime racket involving medical professionals. However, his task becomes harder every day as the case becomes murkier and complex.

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: After CBI officer Bose recovers from a coma, people start to address him by a different name. However, he soon realises that this is a plot by the state CM to seek revenge for an old rivalry. How Bose rediscovers his past and identity forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: F3
programme.desc: Venky, a middle-class businessman, his friend Varun, an orphan, Tamanna, her sister Mehreen and Raghu, a failed producer, team up with Rajendra Prasad, an honest cop fed up with his corrupt boss Commissioner Sampath, for a heist.

programme.title: Bhuvana Oru Kelvikuri
programme.desc: Two pals, Nagaraj and Sampath, live life on their own terms. Nagaraj, being careless, lives without committing to anyone, but Sampath, who does, loses his partner.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: 2 brothers from India working in Kuwait are sentenced to death penalty for killing an srilankan women. Day before there hanging the news breakout in an Indian news channel by a lady reporter.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Chaahat

programme.title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
programme.desc: Alizeh, an independent woman recovering from a breakup, and Ayan, a naive musician, meet in New York and form an incredible bond. From there, they experience love, heartbreak and the facts of life.

programme.title: The Fighter Mard No. 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer, Prabhakaran, puts a notorious gangster, Easwaramoorthy, behind bars. When Easwaramoorthy learns of his identity, he decides to take revenge by targeting Prabhakaran's sister.

programme.title: Ab Kya Hoga
programme.desc: After Ram's mother shares her desire of wanting a grandchild, he decides to get married. Later, Ram accuses his wife of being a ghost.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.title: Kadamban
programme.desc: Kadamban along with a group of villagers wages a war against a powerful businessman, who wants to destroy the forest surrounding Kadamban's village for his greed.

programme.title: Shaandaar
programme.desc: Jagjinder Joginder, a wedding planner, brings together the dysfunctional family of businessman Bipin Arora while making arrangements for his daughter's destination wedding in London.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Sagar, Sam and Aarav decide to dive underwater to find treasure in a sunken ship in order to help Sam clear his debt. However, one of them has a hidden agenda of his own.

programme.title: Ghar Ho To Aisa

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep2

programme.title: Revolutionary Road

programme.title: A Royal Winter
programme.desc: While on a last-minute European holiday, a young woman finds herself in the middle of a real-life fairy tale when a chance meeting with a handsome local leads to something more.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: In this terrifyingly suspenseful thriller, a family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound.

programme.title: The Bite (S1) Ep3

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster children. Inspired by a true story, discover this must see family comedy from the creators of Daddy's Home.

programme.title: Modern Murder: Level X
programme.desc: Simson is a popular social media prankster. When he is shot by an unknown assailant while live-streaming a prank, police find themselves unable to get any witness information. Investigations reveal the darker side of the glitzy world of social media.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Wayfarer
programme.desc: Thomas Bareski is a wandering, nature-loving ex-cop who lives out of his van and his life’s mission is to help solve some of France’s 310 unsolved murders. He arrives in Montallier to investigate his first case – the disappearance of a young girl.

programme.title: The Carer
programme.desc: Dorottya is a young theatre actress who’s elated when offered the job as caretaker for the legendary stage actor Sir Michael Gifford. That is, until she finds out he’s a grumpy and irascible old man. Yet, an unexpected friendship soon blossoms.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Homicide in St. Petersburg
programme.desc: When a childhood friend accused of murder by the Russian mafia is kidnapped, Karla feels a personal connection to the case. How will she figure out the truth of the matter?

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Aydede (Road To The Moon)
programme.desc: An upset Bekir who had recently lost his grandfather is told by his mother that his beloved grandfather has gone to the moon. While the adults fight over the inheritance, Bekir only dreams of flying to the moon with a bicycle, just like in a movie he saw.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: Anna is 40 – a mother of three and an overtaxed teacher. Daily, she struggles to balance her commitments. When she learns of her husband’s infidelity, the manic pace of her life spirals to a crashing – and catastrophic – halt for all involved.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Young, Blonde & Dead
programme.desc: When the mutilated bodies of three girls are found, police affirm that a serial killer is on the loose. As part of investigations, Inspector Julia enters the world of the rich and mighty – where the killer might be closer to her than she’d ever imagine.

programme.desc: After having her research stolen by her boyfriend, marine biologist Dr. Julika Bergmann decides to leave Germany and visit a friend in Portugal. There, she is offered her dream job by a businessman to renaturalize coral reefs, but all is not what it seems.

programme.desc: Through nursery rhymes and the politics of language, we see a childhood spent under Japanese Imperial rule in 1940s Singapore.

programme.desc: Paul is a bachelor and a charming womanizer. But his life takes an abrupt turn when he falls deeply in love with Iris, an engaged woman. With the help of his best guy pals and his Rottweiler dog, he goes all out to woo her with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: Playmaker

programme.title: My Words, My Lie, My Love
programme.desc: A hapless waiter finds an unpublished manuscript and decides to claim it as his own to win his lady love. Fame and romance soon follow when the book gets published. But then, the real author appears on the scene.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 06
programme.desc: At an antique store, Michael shows off an impossible way to organize your clothes, and back at the supermarket we find out that there are some serious surprises lurking in our favorite foods. Finally, at the Navy Yard, Michael pushes his skills to the limit when he attempts one of his most ambitious feats yet - tricking two people at the same time!

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 10
programme.desc: A whip-smart Cambodian doctor comes to the U.S. for a medical treatment to save her ailing son. When the system fails, she refuses to be beaten down and becomes a cleaning lady for organized crime.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 9
programme.desc: The guys take over New Orleans, as they steal sips from strangers' drinks at a famous bar, spin the Wheel of Voo-Doom on Bourbon Street, and crash some horse and buggy rides. Then, tonight's loser turns into a legendary swamp monster.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 10
programme.desc: The guys head to the park asking strangers to agree with their bizarre points of view, then give classless lessons about real estate. Plus, tonight's loser finds himself in a harrowing race to the finish at the racetrack.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 08
programme.desc: In this special crossover event, the Impractical Jokers help Michael stun coffee bar customers - but soon discover the joke is on them! Plus, Michael's woodland creatures display fantastic hidden abilities.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 09
programme.desc: Michael is back in Chicago to hash out new ideas in a hemp store, but it's not until he inspects a spooky church that people start getting stoned, literally. Plus, Michael teams up with special guest star, Jack Black!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 14
programme.desc: Outraged that he’s being forced to work with university nemesis, Barry Kripke, Sheldon faces a crisis of conscience. Howard and Raj spend a thousand dollars on action figures of themselves.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 15
programme.desc: A fight between Leonard and Sheldon drives Leonard to finally move in with Penny – not realizing how the shift will affect Penny and Amy’s living arrangements.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 16
programme.desc: While the guys try to give their significant others the perfect Valentine’s Day, Raj and Stuart throw a lonely people party at the comic book store.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 17
programme.desc: After a terrible date, Raj vows to never leave his apartment again. Meanwhile, Penny actually impresses Sheldon with her acting skills.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 18
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard try to advance the cause of women in science by speaking with junior high girls about their future careers, while Raj plans his date with Lucy.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S17 7
programme.desc: This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Academy Award winner Cate Blanchett star in F. Scott Fitzgerald's story of the life and loves of a man experiencing his life backwards-- The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button. Director David Fincher brings this remarkable tale to the screen. Benjamin Button, is born as an 80-year-old man in New Orleans just after World War I and proceeds to grow younger as time passes. Button, who like any other man is unable to stop time, experiences life and his love for Daisy oddly out of synch with the rest of humanity in this time traveler's tale of the people and places Benjamin Button encounters, the loves he loses and finds, the joys of life and the sadness of death, and what lasts beyond time.

programme.title: Remember Me

programme.title: Bionic Woman S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Angel Of Mercy - Jaime, disguised as a nurse, is assigned to fly into a civil war-torn South American country to rescue the American ambassador and his wife.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep34
programme.desc: What Every Young Man Should Know - Samantha is not totally convinced Darrin would marry her if he knew she was a witch. Endora sends Darrin and Samantha back in time to find out.

programme.title: Cheers S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Fortune And Men's Weights - Coach brings fortunes to Cheers when he buys an antique scale.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S4 Ep18
programme.desc: Desperate - When a young woman is found brutally murdered after a violent sexual assault, the squad rest their hopes on the only witness to the crime, the woman's young son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S4 Ep19
programme.desc: Appearances - Discovery of an 8-year-old beauty queen's body in a suitcase sends the squad searching for a pedophile with a fetish for pageants. However, the prime suspect blames a virtual pornography website for his crime.

programme.title: Yes, Minister S3 Ep02
programme.desc: The Challenge - In a re-organization of government administration, Jim has the task of reducing local government bureaucracy. While commenting to a BBC radio interviewer, Jim does not know just how daunting this task will be.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S2 Ep01
programme.desc: Doogenstein - Doogie is haunted by a Frankenstein-like dream and, with the help of a psychologist, realizes that he has been neglecting his own life so he can attend to his medical duties.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Four And Twenty Blackbirds - The death of an eminent painter arouses Poirot's suspicions especially when he learns that there are a number of curious events connected with the case and someone stands to inherit a fortune.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S7 Ep11
programme.desc: Family Doctor - Jessica investigates a mob hit when Seth (William Windom) is asked to help a crime boss (Tige Andrews) shot at a Boston restaurant.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S4 Ep20

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S4 Ep21

The ASC Archive will be a compilation of the deep conservations about the guests' albums, the diverse requests they carry out, as well as TMIs from behind-the-scenes.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd Part 5 Ep17

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd Part 5 Ep18
programme.desc: Fujiko's Gift - Shortly after moving to a new hideout, Lupin wakes up to a spoilt toilet and argues with Jigen for access to his toilet.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd Part 5 Ep19
programme.desc: A 7.62Mm Mirage - A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck North Africa. These are actually a challenge made to Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd Part 5 Ep20
programme.desc: Zenigata, Gentleman Thief - Lupin’s gang visits the Northern Angel on the outskirts of Russia. The dull-looking town turns out to be full of riches.

programme.title: The Helpful Fox Senko-San Ep7
programme.desc: You Smell Like Another Fox - While cleaning the table, Nakano has a sore back from carrying heavy items at work. Senko offers to massage for him.

programme.title: The Helpful Fox Senko-San Ep8
programme.desc: I’ll Make You Forget All About It - Nakano has one day of summer holiday to take a break. Shiro decides to bring them to the beach for some fun.

programme.title: The Helpful Fox Senko-San Ep9
programme.desc: Is This Less Embarrassing For You? - Nakano sees a food show on television and wants to eat gratin. Senko decides to learn the dish and cook it for him.

programme.title: The Helpful Fox Senko-San Ep10
programme.desc: It’s Nice To Let Your Inner Child Out Now And Then, Isn’T It? - It is snowing heavily in the morning. However, Nakano is still planning to go to work, much to Senko’s dismay.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Ep11
programme.desc: Diving Into Dreams Once Again!! Break Through The Pink Defense Line - Yuko dives into Momo’s dreams again and hopes to get her to open up a bit more. However, she has to break through her outer defenses first.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Ep12
programme.desc: Feelings To Convey!! A New Leap Forward For Demonkind!! - Yuko chases after Momo. In an attempt to make her stay, she proposes for Momo to become her vassal to search for Sakura.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Season 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Duel Again! The New Form Of The Magical Girl? - Momo misinterprets Shamiko’s note as a call to hang out as friends. Instead, what Momo wanted was to have a duel with Momo.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Season 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Search In The Ruins! Mikan With A Reason And The Excited Demon - Shamiko and others visit Mikan’s abandoned old house to search for the whereabouts of Shamiko’s father, Joshua.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Season 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Dark Witch Comes Again! Steamy From Hell! - Shamiko and Momo learn Lilith has been trapped for 2000 years, so they plan to let her hang out a day in Shamiko’s body.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep61
programme.desc: Insects At Night Gather In The Light - Gintoki and Nizou fight furiously. Nizou’s possessed by Benizakura while Gintoki fights with Tetsuko’s sword.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep62
programme.desc: What You Want Is Not What You Get - Yamazaki reports the battle between Katsura and Takasugi to Hijikata. He orders Yamazaki to investigate Gintoki.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep63
programme.desc: The Preview Of The Next Edition Of Jump Is Unreliable - One night, Zenzo is out for delivering pizza. But when he jumps to the ground, his butt hits Gintoki’s bike.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep64
programme.desc: Eating Corn Is Unexpectedly Very Filling - Katsura, the head of Jouishishi, is scared that people think he is a radical, so he wants to increase his favorability.

programme.title: Legend Of The Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These – Collision Ep7
programme.desc: What Has Been Lost - Hilda convinced Mecklinger, to pay visit to her cousin, von Kummel, who strongly admires Mecklinger’s great skills.

programme.title: Legend Of The Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These – Collision Ep8
programme.desc: Court Of Inquiry - A sudden recall order forces Yang to head for the capital planet Heinessen with minimal personnel.

programme.title: Tokyo Revengers Ep18
programme.desc: Open Fire - Takemichi goes back to the past with a new mission: to protect Keisuke from dying.

programme.title: Tokyo Revengers Ep19
programme.desc: Turn Around - The Bloody Halloween conflict that results in Toman being taken over by Valhalla has finally begun.

programme.title: Tokyo Revengers Ep20
programme.desc: Dead Or Alive - During the Bloody Halloween, Manjiro is beaten up terribly by Kazutora. Ken and Takemichi try to save Manjiro.

programme.title: Tokyo Revengers Ep21
programme.desc: One And Only - A fatal tragedy is about to occur, but at whose hands?

programme.title: Tokyo Revengers Ep22
programme.desc: One For All - Manjiro recalls past events and how Keisuke was the one responsible for creating Toman.

programme.title: Mob Psycho 100 II Ep2
programme.desc: Urban Legends ~Encountering Rumors~ - Without any new customers recently, Reigen brings Mob out in search of urban legends and potential jobs.

programme.title: Mob Psycho 100 II Ep3

programme.title: Mob Psycho 100 II Ep4

programme.title: Mob Psycho 100 II Ep5

programme.title: Born To Be Wild Ep1
programme.desc: South America - Born To Be Wild

programme.title: Bokeh
programme.desc: On a romantic getaway to Iceland, a young American couple wake up one morning to discover every person on earth has disappeared. Their struggle to survive the mysterious event lead them to reconsider everything.

programme.title: Global Effect
programme.desc: A soldier (Daniel Bernhardt) leads a band of mercenaries to rescue a scientist (Mädchen Amick) and prevent a terrorist (Joel West) from unleashing a devastating virus.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A primatologist wants to return a gorilla to the wild, and a geologist wants to find diamonds. Their mutual expedition to the Congo uncovers the lost city of Zinj - and its deadly secret.

programme.title: Beta Test
programme.desc: Champion gamer Max Troy discovers events in a video game are being mirrored in the real world. Joining forces with the game's protagonist to unravel the conspiracy before the game's sinister plot overwhelms the city.

programme.title: One Point O
programme.desc: After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of The Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry 'Indiana' Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

programme.title: Steel Sharks
programme.desc: In this undersea thriller, a United States chemist is captured by terrorists. But a rescue attempt by an elite group of Navy Seals goes wrong when they are captured. Now they must wage a silent war beneath the waves.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Story centers on a traumatized woman fleeing from her abusive ex-husband with her 7-year-old son. In their new, remote sanctuary they find they have a bigger, more terrifying monster to deal with.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Hilarious comedy of a tough, hard-hitting Detroit street cop who takes matters into his own hands when a murder investigation takes him to the ultra-chic community of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942, after falling in love with a French agent during a dangerous North African mission, an Allied counter-intelligence agent is quietly notified that the woman he has married and had a baby with is likely a Nazi spy.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Danube - From crystal-clear waterfalls to baby turtles the size of a thumbnail - explore the magical wonders of the Danube. Branching out across Europe, its tributaries gather water from 19 countries.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Pulled Under - On the Parana river, countless fishermen have been violently pulled into the water and some have even mysteriously disappeared. Cyril ventures deeper and deeper into caiman to answer one question: what beast could possibly be strong enough to pull a man under?

programme.title: Reindeer Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan travels into the wilderness of Lapland to see nature's greatest spectacle, the Northern Lights, learning essential skills from the indigenous people along the way.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Alexander witnesses a volcanic eruption, visits the original geyser, learns about the Icelandic belief in elves, takes a trip to an unusual museum and meets an Icelandic rock band.

programme.title: The Supervet S7 Ep10
programme.desc: Milo and Ollie - Noel treats eight-year-old Dalmatian Milo, whose squashed spinal cord is causing him constant pain. And can Noel fuse four-year-old shih-tzu Ollie's elbow and save his leg?

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep1
programme.desc: French Polynesia - Martin explores French Polynesia through French baguettes and coral wine, and on a Polynesian outrigger canoe. He swims with sharks, investigates Marlon Brando's wildlife programme, and sails to the remote Marquesas to meet a local horse whisperer.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungles: In The Thick Of It - Jungles are home to 80% of all species but they cover just 2% of the planet. When animals in these crowded forests want to mate, the challenge is how to stand out from the crowd.

programme.desc: Yogurt - Gregg Wallace visits a factory in rural Somerset that produces one million pots of yogurt every 24 hours, while Cherry Healey helps out with the UK's biggest blackcurrant harvest.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Freshwater: Timing Is Everything - Freshwater is often the stage on which millions of animals gather to find a mate. And the cycle of freshwater is the trigger for spectacular mating rituals and fierce competition.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawkes Bay - Historian Riria Hotere heads out to sea to check out an innovative fishing method. Meanwhile, maritime archaeologist Matt Carter investigates a fascinating wartime mystery and geologist Hamish Campbell finds fortune in the region's tectonic terroir.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kyrgyzstan - Steve and the team head to remotest Kyrgyzstan in search of snow leopards - if the team can find evidence of the endangered big cat, they could protect the region.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Madagascar - Robson Green hunts the powerful jobfish in Madagascar, before teaming up with locals to spear an octopus.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Anna’s clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna’s scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Family’s matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies’ leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life Begins Ep1
programme.desc: For the first few weeks of life, the world is a frightening place. Danger lurks around every corner. It pays to be alert. Whether predator or prey. Any day might be your last. The race is on to grow up fast- for even the largest animals are vulnerable to

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Lessons Ep2
programme.desc: If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades – but all, have lots to learn along the way.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Eyes Ep4

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Rupert And The Grumbleclouds - Rupert goes to meet Bill who seems very grumpy. Bill has grumble clouds over his head. Edward is the next one to have a dark, purple cloud over his head and he becomes very sad. Ping Pong tries a spell and the clouds break up and go away but then they return above everyone's head. Everyone gets the grumps except Rupert and Ming. Rupert and Ming try to make the others laugh and succeed with their disastrous magic show. Everyone starts laughing and they all cheer up!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Rupert And The Playful Wind - Rupert, Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill meet a young wind, Gustus. All of the grown up winds are too busy making weather and Gustus has no one to play with so he gets very bored and mischievous and causes chaos with his wind. Rupert shows Gustus some games he can play using his wind in a more productive way.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep39
programme.desc: Skeleton Town - The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep40
programme.desc: Familiar Feeling - When Puss discovers the coveted Crown of Souls gemstone was split into three pieces for three witch sisters, he finds Malviola and asks for her stone

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep39
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 1 - The Defenders of the Wing are a local island tribe, which worships dragons and believe the Riders have stolen their protector – the Eruptodon dragon.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep40
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 2 - Hiccup, Mala, Astrid, Fishlegs, and Snotlout go searching for the now captured Eruptodon, but little do they know that Viggo has a sinister plan.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Rupert’S Bird’S Eye View - Rupert and Bill wish they could see more from the Tree House Telescope so Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to give them a better view. Unfortunately the magic is more powerful than they expect and the Telescope Platform, with Rupert and Bill on board, detaches itself and flies off to find a better view. At first, Rupert and Bill are excited to be flying about, but then the Telescope begins to cause trouble, first landing on Ping Pong's Pagoda, then heading to Rocky Bay where it lands on the Lighthouse to enjoy the sea view. By now, Rupert and Bill, who cannot get down, want to go home and the Lighthouse Keeper is beside himself. The Telescope Platform is blocking the Lighthouse light and with night approaching it will be a disaster if they cannot get the Platform to go back to the Tree House.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Rupert And The Memory Man - The friends don't know what to do when a spell goes wrong and Edward loses his memory. Although Raggety summons up the Memory Man to show Edward some exciting memories from his past he still can't remember anything until Rupert gives him one of his very favourite things: an apple…..

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep35
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Perfect Present - Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends… but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep36
programme.desc: Raa Raa The Copycat - Raa Raa is playing a game - copying everyone in the jungle. He soon distracts his friends… but can he put the game to good use?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep87
programme.desc: Just One Hornetto - Stingo's cousin Hornetto pays a visit to the garden and quickly charms all the tots. Stingo and Slugsy decide he must be stopped from staying permanently at all costs!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep88

programme.desc: A Present for Ron - Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Dora the Explorer S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Dora's Dance to the Rescue - Put on your dancing shoes, because Dora needs you to spin, shake wiggle, jump and clap with her as she tries to rescue Swiper the fox, who's been trapped inside a bottle by a mean dancing elf.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt/Deer Ball - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef - Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Royally Spooked! / Pups Save Monkey-Dinger - Another Mission PAW to Barkingburg! The Princess thinks she's seen a ghost, and the PAW Patrol needs to get to the bottom of it. // While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep712
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Pupmobiles - Mayor Goodway honors the Paw Patrol with the Key to the City. But Sid Swashbuckle and his trusty pirate pup Arrby swipe the key. Ryder calls for an Ultimate Rescue as the pups team up, Police style, to solve the mystery and stop those pesky pirates.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Pups Get Skunked / Pups and a Whale of a Tale - When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale that’s trapped under the ice.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups vs Three Super Baddies - Harold, Ladybird, and the Copycat team up and the three super baddies take the Mighty Pups' mighty meteor! The Mighty Pups have to get their meteor back and Charge Up to stop them before the team of baddies destroys Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep19
programme.desc: The Art Badge - The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it, while preparing their own pieces for Tino the artistic mouse's Woodland Biennale.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Scoop Snoop / Eye Can't - The Action News Team struggles to find out how Katherine Mulligan is scooping their news leads. // Trying to avoid a trip to the eye doctor, Lisa makes a new pair of glasses that actually makes her eyesight worse.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep110
programme.desc: The Slumber Party / Grooming Gary - Pearl's getting ready for her slumber party, but Mr. Krabs' meddling in the party preparations is getting out of control. // SpongeBob decides to enter Gary in a pet show and gives him a makeover after seeing the competition.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep111
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants vs. The Big One - SpongeBob and his friends are swept away by a giant wave and find themselves stranded on a remote tropical island. To get back to Bikini Bottom, they need to learn how to surf from enigmatic surf guru, Jack Kahuna Lagun.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep196
programme.desc: The Fishbowl - Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick's behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Tiny Toddler / Magical Beefery Tour - After misplacing the shrink ray Captain Man & Kid Danger have to battle The Toddler to win it back. // When Captain Man & Kid Danger find a golden pickle in their burger they win a private tour of the secretive factory where Beefo's Burgers are made.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep422
programme.desc: A Star is Scorned / Senior Moment - Lori regrets everything she hasn't done in high school, and vows to make up for lost time in her senior year. // When Lola realizes that double the cuteness could help her break into show business, she teams up with Lily.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Wheel and Deal / Feast or Family - Lana wants to win a race car ride-along with her hero, so she and Lincoln enter to compete in a soap box derby. // When Luan must enroll in a culinary class, Dad uses it to share his passion for cooking with one of his kids.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep171
programme.desc: Karen 2.0 / InSpongeiac - When Plankton replaces his computer wife Karen with the new, better Karen 2, the original Karen ends up working at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob can’t get to sleep, and asks for help from Patrick… who can’t stay awake.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep103
programme.desc: Spongicus / Suctioncup Symphony - Plankton has demolished the Chum Bucket! In its place, he has built a Roman coliseum. // The Bikini Bottom Symphony is accepting submissions for their composition contest, and Squidward is determined to win.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!
